covid19visuals.name: Covid19Visuals.com
covid19visuals.description: A website that shows various kinds of visualizations related to COVID-19 for Global and over 180 countries. Also includes Detailed Curve Analysis, Is Curve Flattening?

parking-suggest.name: Parking Suggest
parking-suggest.description: An IoT based project to find the nearest available parking and slot to the user using geo-location and Ultrasonic sensors in smart parkings. Also features smart parking, automatic billing uaing RFID.

mood-food-recommender.name: Mood based Food/Restaurant Recommender
mood-food-recommender.description: Tells you where to go and eat food based on your mood. A data science project, created using Zomato Restaurant dataset and a mood-based-food survey.

order-delivery-forecast.name: Order Delivery Forecast for E-commerce
order-delivery-forecast.description: A machine learning project, built for a Dell Hackathon, to predict order delivery forecast to various pincodes using various features and linear regression algorithm. Integrated with a fully featured e-commerce store.

twitter-sentiment-analyser.name: Twitter Sentiment Analyser
twitter-sentiment-analyser.description: A portal where you can search for a hashtag, topic or a keyword, it will fetch recent 100 tweets related to the input and analyse sentiments of tweets.
